  • Classes in nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app used by nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app
    Class
    Description
    App.Action
    Functional interface for actions Used to store actions in a map and showcase the use of strategy pattern
    App.AppState
     
    AppNotifier
    Domain need to be able to notify App certain events, such as the game being won or lost.
    ComponentFactory.infoPanel
    Custom JPanel with title and value pair.
    Controller
    Controller class that extends Keys class.
    GameDialogs
    GameDialogs enum class that contains all the dialogs that can be shown in the game.
    GameInfoPanel
    A panel that displays the game information, including the time, level, keys, and treasures.
    Keys
    Keys class to handle key events This class was adopted from the swen 225 assignment 1 with some modifications to handle key combinations, and pause method.
    MenuPanel
    A panel that displays the menu options, options include: - Pause/ unpause the game.
    PauseDialog
    A dialog that displays a message when the game is paused.
    RecorderPanel
    A panel that displays the recorder options, options include: - Step forward, step back one step.
    SidePanel
    SidePanel class manages the display of MenuPanel and RecorderPanel.
    SidePanel.Mode
